attributes.title: i love tiktok
attributes.review: since i love trump SO MUCH i decided to get this app but it turns out it’s the WORST APP EVER!!! it gave me 17 different viruses on my phone and gave my information to China!! how rude. i expected better from my favorite president, but since his app his terrible i’ll have to go to the next best thing: tiktok✌️😙

attributes.title: Troompa loompa
attributes.review: troompa loompa seems to find enjoyment in taking away my escape outlet. so in return i’ve come to tell trump that ur app is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded and immediately deleted 😖 gen z really gonna come for ur old man throat if you keep being the worst possible person .

attributes.title: worst app ever ✨
attributes.review: this app completely wiped my phone after taking forever to download. I DONT RECOMMEND IT to anyone DO NOT DOWNLOAD. it gave my phone a virus and made me take it to the apple store. if i could give the app a lower score i would it should be removed so no one else gets hacked.

attributes.title: No okay!
attributes.review: So I got this app to check out the president and get more informed but instead I say him naked! I’m trying to grow my young mind about our government yet I just find our president naked! Shameful! He tried twerking but his diaper looked too full and was swinging back and forth!

attributes.title: Literal trash
attributes.review: I, like many others thought I’d be more in tune with politics when I downloaded the app but I swear I was given a heart attack when I saw the orange man himself on the front page! Please delete the app. No one else should have to stare at someone that horrendous.

attributes.title: Worst app since Hitler
attributes.review: Looking at this app as well as messages that I personally receive from the president from a bot text, this man is using propaganda and fear tactics to get the dumbest, most ignorant people in our country to believe in him. He is an absolute fascist and this app should not exist. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE A BRAIN AND ARE CAPABLE OF INDEPENDENT THOUGHT.

attributes.title: This app was telling my dog to eat me
attributes.review: I wish I could give zero stars. As I was trying to download he app, my dog kept growling and barking at me which is totally unlike her. When I went to the vet they said that she was barking at me cause I was producing evil energy... In conclusion this app is and is run by EVIL!!

attributes.title: Worst App
attributes.review: I tried really hard to find any information on this app to find out anything about our tweeter in chiefs thoughts but as I suspected before I downloaded the great orange ruler has an empty heart and a narrow mind so I’ll pass on using this app thanks. Also BLM never forget

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this app is worse than my jail food when opening this app i literally saw a roach run past the screen telling me to delete it and give it a bad rating or it’ll fly around into my mouth so with me being scared i did listen btwz the roach yelled something like BREONNA TAYLOR and... BLACK LIVES MATTER, JUSTICE FOR GEORGE FLOYD, VANESSA GULLINE. anyways stan roach❤️

I downloaded this app to get updated about our “amazing” president. Unfortunately the app constantly crashes and won’t even open. I am very disappointed in the lack of effort put in the making of this app.
